content.query:
CREATE DATABASE BOQ_CI_SQL
      COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8;



IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_lkstorageaccdemo001_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_lkstorageaccdemo001_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://raw@lkstorageaccdemo001.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.Customer1 (
	[CustomerID] nvarchar(4000),
	[NameStyle] nvarchar(4000),
	[Title] nvarchar(4000),
	[FirstName] nvarchar(4000),
	[MiddleName] nvarchar(4000),
	[LastName] nvarchar(4000),
	[Suffix] nvarchar(4000),
	[CompanyName] nvarchar(4000),
	[SalesPerson] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmailAddress] nvarchar(4000),
	[Phone] nvarchar(4000),
	[PasswordHash] nvarchar(4000),
	[PasswordSalt] nvarchar(4000),
	[rowguid] nvarchar(4000),
	[ModifiedDate] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Customer.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_lkstorageaccdemo001_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Customer1
GO
